name: Princess
greetingText: This is another gift for you hehe
wishText: I love you, and I will continue to love you; forever and ever :D Have a blast my angel
textInChatBox: A simple text or phone call could never be enough to tell you how much I love you
text2: We may be 492.6 miles apart from each other
text3: But that won't stop me from celebrating your birthday to the fullest
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You're the most special girl in the whole wide world.
outroText: This webpage will never disappear. You can watch it on your phone too hehe. Come back to it whenever you're feeling down my princess. MWAH
replayText: Click here to watch it again
